directions: Combine beef stock, black beans, tomatoes, steak, tomato sauce, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, milk, cumin, fajita seasoning, garlic, lime juice, and red pepper flakes in a large pot over medium heat. Cover pot and simmer for 30 minutes. Add rice and cook until rice is tender, about 30 minutes.
Garnish soup with Monterey Jack cheese, avocado, and tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can seasoned black beans, rinsed and drained
8 ounces leftover steak strips, cut into bite-size strips
1 (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
title: Steak Fajita Soup
